ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: I have iman in your Lord so listen to me!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I believe in your Lord, so listen to me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: I believe in your Lord; so listen to me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Messengers, listen to me. I believe in your Lord."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Indeed I have believed in your Lord, so heed me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, I have believed in your Lord, so listen to me!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely I believe in your Lord, therefore hear me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Behold, I believe in your Lord; therefore hear me!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! I have believed in your Lord, so hear me!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Indeed, I have believed in your Lord, so listen to me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily I believe now in your Lord; so hearken Unto me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed I have faith in your Lord, so listen to me.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For me, I have faith in the Lord of you (all): listen, then, to me!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily! I have believed in your Lord, so listen to me!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: I believe in your Lord, so hear me'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: I have believed in your Lord, so listen to me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, I have believed in your Lord, so listen to me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:25] Lo! I believe in your Lord. So listen to me!’, in other words, hear what I have to say; but they stoned him and he died.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 498 (Lo! I have believed in your Lord, so hear me) so obey me regarding faith; it is also said that he said this to the apostles: 'I believe in your Lord, so be witnesses that I am the slave of Allah'. He was then taken away and killed, crucified and trodden upon until his entrails burst forth from his rectum.
